name: brown stag
dieMessage: a dying brown @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@stag@c-reset@ falls to the ground with a heavy thud.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ hops a bit and tries to kick @player-name@ with its hooves!
The @npc-color-name@ snorts and charges at @player-name@ from afar!
The @npc-color-name@ aims its antlers toward @player-name@'s torso!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ snorts and charges at @player-name@, digging its antlers into @player-name@ with devastating effect, @player-name@ @c-bold@@c-yellow@CRIES@c-reset@ out in pain!
The @npc-color-name@ stomps about in the dirt before charging at @player-name@, with an audible crack of @player-name@'s ribs occurring, @player-name@ is desperately trying to recover!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ stomps around before charging at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ meticulously harvests the grass and other edible plants at the side of the trail.
